summary: Completed testing of P0 features: Calendar interactivity (click-to-edit, drag-and-drop) and User-specific public URLs. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/public/users/{user_id}/profile returns user name and public projects
Backend: GET /api/public/users/{invalid_id}/profile returns 404 with 'User not found'
Backend: Task CRUD operations (create, update, delete) working correctly
Backend: Task datetime update for drag-drop reschedule working
Frontend: Calendar page loads with tasks displayed
Frontend: Click-to-edit opens Edit Task dialog with pre-filled data (title, description, datetime, recurrence)
Frontend: Edit Task dialog shows Delete button
Frontend: Task update saves correctly and shows 'Task updated!' toast
Frontend: Task deletion shows confirmation dialog and deletes task with 'Task deleted!' toast
Frontend: Drag-and-drop reschedules non-recurring tasks with 'Task rescheduled!' toast
Frontend: Non-recurring tasks have drag handle (GripVertical icon)
Frontend: Public Site nav link has correct href (/public/user/{user.id})
Frontend: Public Site nav link has target='_blank' for new tab
Frontend: Public User Profile page displays user name heading (Admin's Homestead)
Frontend: Public User Profile page shows public projects count (3 public projects)
Frontend: Public User Profile page displays project cards with Public badge
Frontend: Public User Profile page shows error state for invalid user ID
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_Edit_Task and TEST_Drag_Task for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 features (Calendar interactivity and Public User URLs) are fully functional. Calendar supports click-to-edit with pre-filled form, delete confirmation, and drag-and-drop for non-recurring tasks. Public Site link in nav correctly uses user.id and opens in new tab. PublicUserPage at /public/user/:userId displays user's public projects correctly with proper error handling for invalid user IDs.
